title: The World God Only Knows: Tenri Arc
alternative_title: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: Tenri-hen, 神のみぞ知るセカイ 天理篇
description: It is summer break and Keima intends to spend all his time on video games. An old acquaintance, the timid girl Tenri, comes back into the neighborhood—and apparently has a lost soul inside her. It is up to Keima and Elysia to unravel the secrets of her heart.
